name: Dark Island
description:
Story

Dark Island is a survival horror game wherein Layla, a newly appointed light house keeper, arrives on Dark island only to discover that the power is out and an unknown darkness is enveloping the island. Can she restore power to the lighthouse before the darkness takes over?

Credits

Game Director/Programmer: Joel Colaco

Producer/Sound Engineer: Ben Nagarajan

Writer: Vinko Tomasic

Voice Actors

Layla: Nina Nikolic

Chris: Jason C.

Coastguard: Lisa Nichole Young

Assets

Soundscape: freesound.org

3D Art: POLYGON - Apocalypse Pack

Controls

Move - W / A / S /D

Sprint - Shift

Jump - Space

Interact - E

Map - M

Flashlight / Torch - F

Objectives - O

Game created in 7 days as part of  Scream FM 2020 / 7dfps 2020
